pr_title: [STORM-3652] Last error not displayed in Topology summary storm ui

timeline.bodyText: The existing getComponentErrorInfo() method adds the remaining properties that the UI is expecting to properly render the error.  See topology-page-template.html
timeline.author: Crim

replies.author: Ethanlm

timeline.bodyText: Populates the thrift response with the last error for this bolt, if it exists.
timeline.author: Crim
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4363,6 +4363,7 @@ private void addBoltAggStats(TopologyPageInfo topoPageInfo, StormTopology topolo
                 CommonAggregateStats commonStats = entry.getValue().get_common_stats();

timeline.bodyText: Added to make consistent with how other floats are returned.
timeline.author: Crim

timeline.bodyText:
I believe the bug is here:
it puts "last-error" in the stat (wrongly),

  
    
      storm/storm-server/src/main/java/org/apache/storm/stats/StatsUtil.java
    
    
         Line 663
      in
      e82b9a7
    
    
    
    

        
          
           m.put("last-error", getLastError(clusterState, topologyId, id)); 
        
    
  


but retrieves it with "lastError"

  
    
      storm/storm-server/src/main/java/org/apache/storm/stats/StatsUtil.java
    
    
         Line 1907
      in
      e82b9a7
    
    
    
    

        
          
           stats.set_last_error((ErrorInfo) m.get(LAST_ERROR)); 
        
    
  


This is a translation error from clojure to java since in clojure (1.x):
https://github.com/apache/storm/blob/1.x-branch/storm-core/src/clj/org/apache/storm/daemon/nimbus.clj#L2269
https://github.com/apache/storm/blob/1.x-branch/storm-core/src/clj/org/apache/storm/stats.clj#L915
timeline.author: Ethanlm

timeline.bodyText:
You can use simulatedTime https://github.com/apache/storm/blob/master/storm-client/src/jvm/org/apache/storm/utils/Time.java#L30.
And then the check can be accurate.
Also please check if https://github.com/apache/storm/blob/master/docs/STORM-UI-REST-API.md#apiv1topologyid-get needs to be updated.
timeline.author: Ethanlm

timeline.bodyText:
Since the previous behavior always defaulted lastError to empty string, and the API docs show it defaulting to empty string, I've left this here for backwards compatibility.
If you think it'd be better to just exclude it (as we do with the other keys like errorPort, errorHost, errorTime etc.. let me know and I can remove the else block.
Or alternatively, we could default the missing keys (errorPort, errorHost, errorTime) to null/empty string when no error has been reported to make their behavior consistent with lastError
Thoughts?
timeline.author: Crim

replies.bodyText: You are right. Sorry I overlooked. I think we can default those keys to empty like you said
replies.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText:
Sorry, it's unclear, would you prefer that I also default errorPort, errorHost, and errorTime to empty string?
Thanks!
replies.author: Crim

replies.bodyText: Sorry for not being clear. I think lastError, errorHost, errorPort, errorWorkerLogLink can default to empty string, and errorTime, errorLapsedSecs can default to null . What do you think?
replies.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText:
Sounds good.  I'll update the code and API docs to reflect that.
Thanks!
replies.author: Crim

replies.bodyText:
Updated the code as well as the API docs.
Thanks!
replies.author: Crim

timeline.message: [STORM-3652] Fix error reporting on topology page
[STORM-3652] Also fix Spout last error display from topology page
[STORM-3652] Add test coverage, format spout stat complete latency

timeline.bodyText:
Bolt and spout have different stats
https://github.com/apache/storm/blob/master/storm-server/src/main/java/org/apache/storm/stats/StatsUtil.java#L2049-L2085
It would be nice to reflect that here even though the information is not really used  .
timeline.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText: Updated to only include the fields required for each component type.
replies.author: Crim

timeline.message: Update test cases to have unique stats template for spout and bolt components
[STORM-3652] Code review adjustments.  Updated API docs to reflect reality, and example of populated lastError values
Update API Docs example values to be consisted with the rest of the example
